reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Port of Spain was a 15 – 20 drive and Queens Park the main area for Carnival was a 10 min drive.
reviews.title: Really Nice Setting

reviews.text: If you are travelling with children or anyone with a wheelchair you will need to stay in the main building as the other part of the guest house has a very steep walk not for the faint hearted.
reviews.title: Beautiful Guest House

likes.liked: — The cleanliness, relaxed atmosphere, and friendliness of the staff

reviews.text: I stayed in the Monique's Guest House because in that week all hotels in Port Of Spain where booked up, that is very usual in POS. I have to say that the place is clean, the exterior areas as well as the room. However, it is too basic for a business traveller. Rooms are old and run up, broken furniture and very low quality features. It is not very convenient for those who have to work in Port Of Span, because of very long traffic jams. And the taxi drivers from the airport will charge you 60 us to go there.
reviews.title: Too basic
Clean
reviews.text: Service is also a down issue, they are not willing to help. The restarurant is terrible and the lobby area is old and creepy.

reviews.title: Very nice guesthouse
reviews.text: I would like to say in their advantage, that they were also booked up and I tried to change room but they couldn't do. Probably if they have some decent rooms this might be a good place to stay for the money paid.
